snippet.title: Dawn of Defense | Announcement Trailer (Tower Defense x RTS x Roguelite)
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2781660/Dawn_Of_Defense
Play Demo on Itch: https://6side.itch.io/dawn-of-defense 

Dawn of Defense is a Roguelite Tower Defense game with RTS elements. Surrounded by enemies, your tribe is the last bastion against the Empire. Build towers to fight enemy troops in the trenches, train warriors and retake territory to build on. Reclaim your lands and defeat the baneful Empire!
